summary: The diff implements a complete order management system with customer/seller portals, authentication via Internet Identity, user profiles, admin access control, order placement/completion, and stock management. The BuildRequest has no explicit requirements (none listed), only constraints and non-goals. Since there are no requirements to verify against, there are no missing requirements. However, the diff implements substantial features that were not requested in the BuildRequest (which is essentially empty). These include authentication, user profiles, admin checks, order management, and stock control systems.

hallucinated_features.description: Complete user authentication system using Internet Identity
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains no requirements for authentication. The diff adds extensive authentication logic including login flows, Internet Identity integration, and session management.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management system with name and room number fields
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains no requirements for user profiles. The diff adds profile creation, storage, and retrieval functionality with a modal setup flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin access control and authorization system
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains no requirements for admin roles or access control. The diff implements comprehensive admin checking, authorization mixins, and access-denied screens.

hallucinated_features.description: Order placement and management system with completion tracking
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains no requirements for order functionality. The diff implements full order creation, retrieval, listing, and completion features.

hallucinated_features.description: Stock management system with availability toggling
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains no requirements for inventory or stock control. The diff adds stock status tracking, indicator displays, and seller controls.

hallucinated_features.description: Complete UI framework with landing page, customer portal, and seller portal
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains no requirements for specific UI pages or portals. The diff implements extensive routing, layouts, and page components for both customer and seller workflows.
